Recollections of Schubert [arr. Rimmer]
Recreation Ground, Burley-in-Wharfedale, Yorkshire
Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £8, 3rd £4, 4th £2, 5th £1. March contest (own choice) - 1st(£1) Rothwell Temperance, 2nd(10s.) Yeadon Old. 2nd annual contest promoted by Arthur Newsome Ltd Public Works Band.
Oct. 22, 2013, 12:14 p.m. Oct. 22, 2013, 12:22 p.m.
